titles.title: A bill to clarify the article description and rate of duty for certain tractor body parts.
A bill to clarify the article description and rate of duty for certain tractor body parts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the article description for certain tractor body parts and to specify their rate of duty.
